name: ccpm
description: Lean Project Management plugin for Claude Code. v1.0: 12 optimized commands (6 natural workflow + 6 project config), 50-60% token reduction via Linear subagent caching, smart agent auto-invocation, tool-agnostic PM architecture (Jira, Confluence, etc. via MCP), monorepo support, user-controlled quality workflow. 82% simpler than v2.x while maintaining power through intelligent automation.
